tsdst.mcmc.mcmcObject¶

class tsdst.mcmc.mcmcObject(name='MCMC Object')[source]¶

An object to hold MCMC chains, and to store/compute useful metrics on them. Also has some common plotting functionality.

To get a chain up and running, run the mcmcWithRaftery method after instantiating the mcmcObject class.

Methods

__init__([name])

Constructor for MCMC object

acf(chainName[, lag, partial, demean])

ACF definition for a wide-sense stationary process, partial acf uses Yule-Walker MLE method.

addChain(newChain[, chainName, concat])

Adds a chain to your collection of chains.

bestRaftery(chainName[, q, r, s, …])

Run multiple Raftery evaluations and compare.

Remove values from chain through burnin process (i.e.

plotACF(chainName[, bounds, ci, acfType, …])

Plot the Autocorrelation function of the chain.

plotDensity(chainName[, smoothing, write, …])

Plot the density of the MCMC chain.

plotTrace(chainName[, CTres, write, …])

Plot the trace of the MCMC chain.

removeChain(chainName[, print_])

Remove a chain from the collection.

runMCMC(start, initSampleSize, lpost, algo)

Generate MCMC samples and evaluate samples size (using Raftery) and convergence.

showChain(chainName)

Display a chain from the collection.

A test to evaluate convergence.
